results.title: Tama Tū
results.brief_description: Maori troops fighting in Europe during World War II entertain themselves in a house while waiting for a battle to begin in this short from Taika Waititi.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

results.description: Six Māori Battalion soldiers camped in Italian ruins wait for night to fall. In the silence, the bros-in-arms distract themselves with jokes. A tohu (sign) brings them back to reality, and they gather to say a karakia before returning to the fray. Director Taika Waititi describes the soldiers as young men with “a special bond, strengthened by their character, their culture and each other.” Shot in the rubble of the old Wellington Hospital, Tama Tū won international acclaim. Invited to over 40 international festivals, its many awards included honourable mentions at Sundance and Berlin.
description_for_label: Six Māori Battalion soldiers camped in Italian ruins wait for night to fall. In the silence, the bros-in-arms distract themselves with jokes. A tohu (sign) brings them back to reality, and they gather to say a karakia before returning to the fray. Director Taika Waititi describes the soldiers as young men with “a special bond, strengthened by their character, their culture and each other.” Shot in the rubble of the old Wellington Hospital, Tama Tū won international acclaim. Invited to over 40 international festivals, its many awards included honourable mentions at Sundance and Berlin.

results.title: T-Rex: Back to the Cretaceous
results.brief_description: Ally Hayden shares her father’s interest in dinosaurs and archaeology. When he brings a mysterious fossil home, she’s convinced it’s a T-rex egg and isn’t wrong. When it breaks open she’s has visions of the Cretaceous period.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

results.description: Ally Hayden is a teenager who shares her father’s interest in dinosaurs and archaeology. When he brings a mysterious fossil back from a dig, she is convinced it’s the egg of a Tyrannosaurus Rex. After accidentally knocking the egg to the floor, Ally begins to experience visions, as if she was being transported back in time to the Cretaceous period. There, she encounters several different dinosaurs, including her favorite, the mighty T-Rex.
description_for_label: Ally Hayden is a teenager who shares her father’s interest in dinosaurs and archaeology. When he brings a mysterious fossil back from a dig, she is convinced it’s the egg of a Tyrannosaurus Rex. After accidentally knocking the egg to the floor, Ally begins to experience visions, as if she was being transported back in time to the Cretaceous period. There, she encounters several different dinosaurs, including her favorite, the mighty T-Rex.

results.title: Sync
results.brief_description: Charlie Cooper is a special agent of the future - the mind of a man running entirely on a computer, able to transfer his consciousness to bio-mechanical bodies at will. But when a computer virus corrupts his system, he must face one of his greatest challenges yet: mortality.
results.description: Charlie Cooper is a special agent of the future - the mind of a man running entirely on a computer, able to transfer his consciousness to bio-mechanical bodies at will. But when a computer virus corrupts his system, he must face one of his greatest challenges yet: mortality.
description_for_label: Charlie Cooper is a special agent of the future - the mind of a man running entirely on a computer, able to transfer his consciousness to bio-mechanical bodies at will. But when a computer virus corrupts his system, he must face one of his greatest challenges yet: mortality.

results.title: Sweet Country
results.creator_credit: Steven McGregor, Warwick Thornton, Bunya Productions, David Tranter, Tony Cronin and Heather Wallace
results.brief_description: It’s 1929 on the vast, desert-like, Eastern Arrernte Nation lands that are now known as the Central Australian outback. Sam Kelly, a middle-aged Aboriginal man, works the land of a kind preacher, Fred Smith. After an ill-tempered bully arrives in town and Kelly kills him in self-defence, he and his wife go on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

constellations_primary.name: Sweet Country
constellations_primary.description: Warwick Thornton’s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

constellations_other.name: David Gulpilil
constellations_other.description: David Gulpilil is a Yolngu man of the Mandhalpuyngu speech of the Djinba language. As a young boy, Gulpilil was an accomplished hunter, tracker and dancer, which he turned into an acclaimed film career that saw him win the Best Actor award at the Cannes Film Festival (for Charlie's Country) and an AACTA for The Tracker, among his many honours.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge!

constellations_other.name: Crime doesn't pay
constellations_other.description: Ned Kelly's famous armour has appeared in many films, but the criminal myth speaks to how audiences have always been captivated by true-crime stories, from the beginning of cinema to today.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.

constellations_other.name: Native Tongue
constellations_other.description: The lead single off her album of the same name, 'Native Tongue' saw artist Mo'Ju explore cultural identity through music, movement and striking visuals.

constellations_other.name: Outlawed
constellations_other.description: From The Story of the Kelly Gang to Sweet Country, this Constellation explores bushrangers, samurai and bandits.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Steven McGregor, Warwick Thornton, Bunya Productions, David Tranter, Tony Cronin and Heather Wallace
results.description:
Aboriginal stockman Sam (Hamilton Morris) goes on the run after shooting white station owner Harry March (Ewen Leslie) in self-defence.   

Warwick Thornton’s Sweet Country explores racism, trauma and morality through a western genre lens and is based on the story of Willaberta Jack, great uncle of sound recordist and co-producer David Tranter, who translated the tale into storyboards, some of which you can see below.

The action unfolds 30km from Alice Springs in the fictional town of Henry, which was created by extending and adding to structures built for a previous film. Its dusty streets and sun-bleached buildings embody western motifs, which are also apparent in the narrative, props and costumes.    

The costumes were hand-painted with dust and powder to blend into the harsh landscape – except for Harry’s black-and-red outfit, which Thornton wanted to look like “a poisonous redback spider”.

“Sweet Country is a western. A period western set in Central Australia. It has all the elements of the genre - the frontier, confiscation of land, subordination and conquest of a people and epic sweeping landscapes.” – Warwick Thornton, director of Sweet Country
description_for_label:
Aboriginal stockman Sam (Hamilton Morris) goes on the run after shooting white station owner Harry March (Ewen Leslie) in self-defence.   

Warwick Thornton’s Sweet Country explores racism, trauma and morality through a western genre lens and is based on the story of Willaberta Jack, great uncle of sound recordist and co-producer David Tranter, who translated the tale into storyboards, some of which you can see below.

The action unfolds 30km from Alice Springs in the fictional town of Henry, which was created by extending and adding to structures built for a previous film. Its dusty streets and sun-bleached buildings embody western motifs, which are also apparent in the narrative, props and costumes.    

The costumes were hand-painted with dust and powder to blend into the harsh landscape – except for Harry’s black-and-red outfit, which Thornton wanted to look like “a poisonous redback spider”.

“Sweet Country is a western. A period western set in Central Australia. It has all the elements of the genre - the frontier, confiscation of land, subordination and conquest of a people and epic sweeping landscapes.” – Warwick Thornton, director of Sweet Country

results.title: Suspiria (2018)
results.headline_credit: Italy and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the troupe’s artistic director, an ambitious young dancer and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare, others will finally wake up.
results.description: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the troupe’s artistic director, an ambitious young dancer and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare, others will finally wake up.
description_for_label: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the troupe’s artistic director, an ambitious young dancer and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare, others will finally wake up.

results.title: Suspiria
results.brief_description: From the moment she arrives in Germany to attend the prestigious Tanz Academy, American ballet-dancer Suzy Bannion (Jessica Harper) senses that something horribly evil lurks within the walls of the age-old institution.

constellations_other.name: Over the Technicolor rainbow
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores the beginning and legacy of Technicolor and was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Adam Virgona and Kristian Vass.

constellations_other.name: The Suspense Constellation
constellations_other.description: An exploration of music in suspense works.

results.description: From the moment she arrives in Germany to attend the prestigious Tanz Academy, American ballet-dancer Suzy Bannion (Jessica Harper) senses that something horribly evil lurks within the walls of the age-old institution.
description_for_label: From the moment she arrives in Germany to attend the prestigious Tanz Academy, American ballet-dancer Suzy Bannion (Jessica Harper) senses that something horribly evil lurks within the walls of the age-old institution.

results.title: Suspense
results.brief_description: Suspense is a 1913 American silent short film thriller directed by Lois Weber and Phillips Smalley. Weber also wrote the scenario and stars in the film with Valentine Paul. The film features early examples of a split screen shot and a car chase.

constellations_other.name: Lois Weber and the split-screen
constellations_other.description: Lois Weber was the third filmmaker to use split screens to show simultaneous action, helping establish it as part of cinematic language, particularly its use in thrillers. It's since been taken to extremes by auteurs and videogames.

results.description: An isolated house is too remote for a lone servant, who leaves a note, quietly exits the back door, and puts the key under the mat. Left alone in the house is a mother and her infant. A tramp has watched the servant leave and begins to skulk. When the lady of the house sees him outside as he discovers the key, she’s terrified and desperately phones her husband, who’s at work in town. He jumps into a car that’s idling in front of his office and races toward home, the car’s owner, and police, in hot pursuit.
description_for_label: An isolated house is too remote for a lone servant, who leaves a note, quietly exits the back door, and puts the key under the mat. Left alone in the house is a mother and her infant. A tramp has watched the servant leave and begins to skulk. When the lady of the house sees him outside as he discovers the key, she’s terrified and desperately phones her husband, who’s at work in town. He jumps into a car that’s idling in front of his office and races toward home, the car’s owner, and police, in hot pursuit.

results.title: Supernatural
results.brief_description: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country in their ‘67 Chevy Impala, battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

results.description: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Subsequently, their father raised them to be soldiers. He taught them about the paranormal evil that lives in the dark corners and on the back roads of America … and he taught them how to kill it. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country in their ‘67 Chevy Impala, battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.
description_for_label: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Subsequently, their father raised them to be soldiers. He taught them about the paranormal evil that lives in the dark corners and on the back roads of America … and he taught them how to kill it. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country in their ‘67 Chevy Impala, battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.

results.title: Supergirl
results.brief_description: Naomi seems like a typical nine-year-old girl, until her passion for powerlifting transforms her life with world record-breaking championships and national news headlines. Supergirl explores Naomi’s coming-of-age journey as she and her Orthodox Jewish family are changed forever by her inner strength and extraordinary talent.
results.description: Naomi seems like a typical nine-year-old girl, until her passion for powerlifting transforms her life with world record-breaking championships and national news headlines. Supergirl explores Naomi’s coming-of-age journey as she and her Orthodox Jewish family are changed forever by her inner strength and extraordinary talent.

results.title: Super Mario Bros.
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1993
results.brief_description: Mario and Luigi, plumbers from Brooklyn, find themselves in an alternate universe where evolved dinosaurs live in hi-tech squalor. They’re the only hope to save our universe from invasion by the dino dictator, Koopa.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.
